Question: The song "Give It to Me", a Timbaland single on which this person guests with Nelly Furtado, reached the Hot 100 number-one spot.
Hints: This person is the executive producer on the MTV reality series The Phone, which premiered on April 21, 2009.
This person was given Sexiest Man titles by Teen People and Cosmopolitan magazines.
On March 30, 2008, this person performed the song at Madonna's Hard Candy Promo Show at Roseland Ballroom in New York City.
